name: I Fought the Lawn
description:
Cut and mow blade after blade in massive overgrown yards, build up your fleet of grass eating machines, and slap on much needed upgrades to help you tackle the most challenging of lawns. Each procedurally generated yard will offer new challenges and rewards. Call upon your friends to help remove every last blade of grass, or save the job for yourself!

  • Take on a variety of lawnmowing jobs, each with varying levels of difficulty.
  • Avoid obstacles and traps hidden in the grass.
  • Buy additional equipment with the money earned.
  • More to come!
